document_data.name: Haldan
document_data.mainbody: '''Haldan''' was a [[thief]] in [[Bloodstone Village]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Haldan was the main source of gossip in the village (often inaccurate). He liked to stay at the [[Inn of the Clowns]].
document_data.History: In [[1356 DR]], Haldan collaborated with a bandit army for some money. In 1357 DR, he was not impressed by [[Gareth Dragonsbane]]'s party.
document_data.Personality: Haldan wanted to always be with the winning side. He did not believe in [[Gareth Dragonsbane]]'s chances of victory against the bandit army, so he agreed to work for them if they would pay him.
